meanings.definition: Covered in small spots or marks
meanings.sent1: The dalmatian had the speckiest coat in the whole litter.
meanings.sent2: The ladybug had the speckiest wings of all the insects in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The speckiest egg in the carton was the one the kids fought over.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the speckiest canvas for the artist's colorful brushstrokes.
meanings.sent5: The speckiest stone on the beach shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Having the most spots or marks compared to others
meanings.sent1: Out of all the apples, the one with the speckiest skin was chosen first.
meanings.sent2: The leopard at the zoo was the speckiest of all the big cats.
meanings.sent3: The speckiest student in the class always had the most interesting stories to share.
meanings.sent4: The speckiest cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy painting.
meanings.sent5: The speckiest car in the parking lot stood out with its unique design.
